ai-patthana17.30:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.30:0.3_0: looking forward to the donor, etc.
ai-patthana17.30:1.1_0: One who has not grasped the teaching of not grasping gives rise to the repulsion of the impingement, etc., for the sake of grasping there is no longer only for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana17.30:1.1_1: Yet when the six classes of rebirth ...
ai-patthana17.30:2.1_0: the repulsion of the impingement of the mind and the underlying tendencies of terminology, and not the condition for the continuation of the present life.
ai-patthana17.30:2.1_1: Ninely in brief, the nine kasiṇas came about,
ai-patthana17.30:2.1_2: nine being reborn in a lower realm ...
ai-patthana17.30:3.1_0: Not grasping, they don’t give rise to repulsion.
